author: Simon Difford
description: As the name suggests this drink combines flavours reminiscent of alcoholic custard with Pedro Ximenez sherry resembling liquid Christmas pudding.
name: Christmas Pudding & Custard Cocktail

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled coupe glass
POUR chilled Pedro Ximenez sherry into second smaller glass to be served on the side
